summary: A curious and lost Eleonore looks for something everywhere, even in the bags of strangers who find themselves sadly smiling only well after she's left their lives. They owe her their thanks.
cast: Bat 'Batman' Baxter|Alex Billig|Wayne Chin|Jerry Damons|Lowell the Dog|John Dwyer|The Fly|Dawn Glickman|Alex Greenblatt|Gary Greenblatt|Eleonore Hendricks|Francesca LaPrelle|Miranda LaPrelle|Astrid Larson|Sam Lisenco|Van Neistat|Eloy Ortega|Charlotte Pinson|Josh Safdie|Ariel Schulman|Andy Spade|Bea Spade|Henry Tejada|Jordan Valdez|Calvin Wilson
title: The Pleasure of Being Robbed
